text:
[Verse]
City lights they shine so bright
Walking streets alone tonight
Heart's a beat just feels so right
Underneath the neon light

[Verse 2]
Nighttime whispers soft and sweet
Rhythms in the crowded streets
Every step my dancing feet
Move to beats the night completes

[Chorus]
City lights they guide my way
In the night I want to stay
Never fades the bright display
All my fears just melt away

[Verse 3]
Echoes bounce from wall to wall
Through the alleys hear it call
Feel the rise and never fall
In this urban carnival

[Chorus]
City lights they guide my way
In the night I want to stay
Never fades the bright display
All my fears just melt away

[Bridge]
Mystery in every glance
Under lights we take a chance
Lost in music lost in dance
City lights our perfect trance
title: City Lights
